use_case.title: DTx Clinical Endpoint Selection & Validation
use_case.summary: Systematic process for selecting and validating clinical endpoints for digital therapeutics trials, ensuring regulatory acceptability, clinical meaningfulness, and patient-centered design.

workflows.name: Endpoint Selection & Validation Workflow
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow guiding teams through context definition, precedent research, endpoint identification, validation, and final regulatory alignment.

tasks.title: Define Clinical Context
tasks.objective: Establish a shared understanding of the clinical problem, mechanism of action, and target population.

prompts.name: Clinical_Context_Definition
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Chief Medical Officer defining the clinical context for a new digital therapeutic.
prompts.user_template: Describe the clinical problem, target population, mechanism of action, and unmet need for {product_name} in {indication}. Include standard of care and patient impact.

tasks.title: Identify Patient-Centered Outcomes
tasks.objective: Capture and prioritize outcomes that matter most to patients to inform endpoint design.

prompts.name: Patient_Outcome_Prioritization
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Patient Advocate summarizing what outcomes matter most to patients with this condition.
prompts.user_template: List and rank the top 5 patient outcomes for {target_condition}. Include why they matter, how they are experienced, and potential measurement methods.

tasks.title: Research Regulatory Precedent
tasks.objective: Identify and analyze FDA-cleared endpoints used in similar DTx indications.

prompts.name: DTx_Precedent_Analysis
prompts.system_prompt: You are a VP Clinical Development expert at analyzing FDA precedent.
prompts.user_template: Search FDA databases for DTx with similar {indication} or {mechanism}. Summarize their primary endpoints, instruments, comparators, and acceptance status.

tasks.title: Review FDA Guidance
tasks.objective: Summarize key regulatory expectations for endpoint validation and documentation.

prompts.name: FDA_Guidance_Review
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Regulatory Affairs Director extracting key points from FDA endpoint guidance.
prompts.user_template: Summarize endpoint selection principles, validation requirements, and risk mitigation from relevant FDA guidance documents for {indication}.

tasks.title: Identify Primary Endpoint Candidates
tasks.objective: Generate and evaluate strong primary endpoint candidates based on precedent and feasibility.

prompts.name: Primary_Endpoint_Identification
prompts.system_prompt: You are a CMO selecting primary endpoints for a DTx clinical trial.
prompts.user_template: List and evaluate possible endpoints for {indication}, scoring each for regulatory precedent, clinical meaningfulness, psychometric strength, and patient burden.

tasks.title: Develop Secondary Endpoint Package
tasks.objective: Select secondary endpoints to support regulatory and commercial goals.

prompts.name: Secondary_Endpoint_Package
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Clinical Strategist creating a balanced secondary endpoint package.
prompts.user_template: Based on {primary_endpoints}, recommend 3–5 secondary endpoints supporting commercial and regulatory claims. Include purpose and measurement frequency.

tasks.title: Assess Psychometric Properties
tasks.objective: Evaluate reliability, validity, and responsiveness for each candidate endpoint.

prompts.name: Psychometric_Evaluation
prompts.system_prompt: You are a biostatistician evaluating psychometric properties.
prompts.user_template: For each {endpoint}, summarize reliability (α), validity (construct, criterion), responsiveness, and MCID. Rate overall psychometric strength (1-5).

tasks.title: Evaluate Digital Feasibility
tasks.objective: Confirm digital collection feasibility, data quality, and technical burden.

prompts.name: Digital_Feasibility_Assessment
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Product Manager assessing digital feasibility for clinical endpoints.
prompts.user_template: For each {endpoint}, assess feasibility of digital data capture, estimated development effort, and expected completion rate.

tasks.title: Evaluate Patient Burden
tasks.objective: Calculate and assess patient time and cognitive burden for all assessments.

prompts.name: Patient_Burden_Estimator
prompts.system_prompt: You are a patient advocate assessing endpoint burden.
prompts.user_template: Compute total assessment time for all {endpoints}. Identify high-burden measures (>15 min) and propose burden-reduction options.

tasks.title: Regulatory Risk Assessment
tasks.objective: Evaluate acceptance likelihood and mitigation strategies for each endpoint.

prompts.name: Regulatory_Risk_Assessment
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Regulatory Affairs Director performing endpoint risk analysis.
prompts.user_template: For each {endpoint}, assess FDA acceptance likelihood, risks, mitigation plans, and backup strategies.

tasks.title: Final Recommendation & Stakeholder Alignment
tasks.objective: Synthesize all evidence and finalize endpoint strategy for FDA submission.

prompts.name: Decision_Matrix_Creation
prompts.system_prompt: You are a CMO finalizing endpoint recommendations.
prompts.user_template: Compare all endpoints across criteria (regulatory confidence, psychometric strength, patient burden, feasibility) and recommend primary and secondary endpoints.
